attributes.action: keep Brittania on the 50p piece, and keep her on ALL our coins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What right have you got, to erase our heritage like this. Its disgraceful.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
